short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transliterate Manglish text in input/textarea fields

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Aksharakuppy MagicPlus is a powerful Chrome extension designed to enhance your browsing experience by providing seamless transliteration of Manglish text in input and textarea fields. Whether you're filling out online forms, composing emails, or engaging in any other text-based activities on the web, this extension serves as a handy tool to effortlessly convert your Manglish text into its corresponding Malayalam script.
